CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c), ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c)), NULL, IF(AND(!ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c), ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c)), (NOW() - ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c), IF(AND(ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c), !ISBLANK(ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c)), (NOW() - ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c), IF(ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c > ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c, (NOW() - ringdna100__Last_Outbound_Call__c), (NOW() - ringdna100__Last_Email_Attempt__c)))))
CustomField.label: Days Since Last Attempt (Call or Email)
